Interface ChessInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChessBoard, KnightsBoard, SquadBoard

    public interface ChessInterface
    The Interface ChessInterface.

      Return the current player.

      Report whether the current player p is in check.

      Returns whether the game is complete.

    • Method Detail

      • isComplete

        boolean isComplete()
        Returns whether the game is complete.
        Returns:
        true if complete, false otherwise.

      • isValidMove

        boolean isValidMove(Move move)
        Returns whether the piece at location [move.fromRow, move.fromColumn] is allowed to move to location [move.fromRow, move.fromColumn].
        Parameters:
        move - a W13project3.Move object describing the move to be made.
        Returns:
        true if the proposed move is valid, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if either [move.fromRow, move.fromColumn] or [move.toRow, move.toColumn] don't represent valid locations on the board.

      • move

        void move(Move move)
        Moves the piece from location [move.fromRow, move.fromColumn] to location [move.fromRow, move.fromColumn].
        Parameters:
        move - a W13project3.Move object describing the move to be made.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if either [move.fromRow, move.fromColumn] or [move.toRow, move.toColumn] don't represent valid locations on the board.

      • inCheck

        boolean inCheck(Player p)
        Report whether the current player p is in check.
        Parameters:
        p - W13project3.Move the Player being checked
        Returns:
        true if the current player is in check, false otherwise.

      • currentPlayer

        Player currentPlayer()
        Return the current player.
        Returns:
        the current player
